net.gotev.uploadservice.http

Interface HttpConnection

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HurlStackConnection

    public interface HttpConnection
    Defines the methods that has to be implemented by an HTTP connection. If you're implementing your custom HTTP connection, remember to never cache anything, especially in writeBody methods, as this will surely cause memory issues when uploading large files. The only things which you are allowed to cache are the response code and body from the server, which must not be large though.

      Closes the connection and frees all the allocated resources.

    • Method Detail

      • setHeaders

        void setHeaders(List<NameValue> requestHeaders,
                boolean isFixedLengthStreamingMode,
                long totalBodyBytes)
         throws IOException
        Set request headers.
        Parameters:
        requestHeaders - request headers to set
        isFixedLengthStreamingMode - true if the fixed length streaming mode must be used. If it's false, chunked streaming mode has to be used
        totalBodyBytes - total number of bytes
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while setting request headers

      • writeBody

        void writeBody(byte[] bytes)
        throws IOException
        Write a byte array into the request body.
        Parameters:
        bytes - array with the bytes to write
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while writing

      • writeBody

        void writeBody(byte[] bytes,
               int lengthToWriteFromStart)
        throws IOException
        Write a portion of a byte array into the request body.
        Parameters:
        bytes - array with the bytes to write
        lengthToWriteFromStart - how many bytes to write, starting from the first one in the array
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while writing

      • getServerResponseCode

        int getServerResponseCode()
                   throws IOException
        Gets the HTTP response code from the server.
        Returns:
        an integer representing the HTTP response code (e.g. 200)
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while getting the server response code

      • getServerResponseBody

        byte[] getServerResponseBody()
                      throws IOException
        Gets the server response body.
        Returns:
        response body bytes
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while getting the server response body

      • getServerResponseHeaders

        LinkedHashMap<String,String> getServerResponseHeaders()
                                               throws IOException
        Gets the server response headers.
        Returns:
        map containing all the response headers
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs while getting the server response headers

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the connection and frees all the allocated resources.
